ctu_text: The applicant must be an accredited journalist by the state government or PIB. The age must be in between 21-65 years. The applicant must not have been covered under the Ayushman Bharat Scheme or any other Health Insurance Scheme of the Central or State Government. The beneficiary will receive medical care facilities for all the diseases as listed by the State government after recommendation by the committee.
